pageProduct.name: Orzene Optimum Oil Repair Conditioner 250ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

Directions

Apply on wet hair, massage gently and rinse thoroughly. For enhanced results, combine it with the rest ORZENE BEER OPTIMUM OIL REPAIR products. In case of contact with eyes, rinse immediately with plenty of water.
